item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m a data scientist who likes to build things, learn, and share my knowledge with others. Up until now I’ve heavily invested in developing my full stack skills but now I’m embarking on a journey to dive deep with deep learning ( in particular computer vision and text-to-speech). In order to document my learnings along the way I created this site; hopefully, you’ll find a post that helps you grok a concept or extend your thinking and perspective.
